Dear applicant we are charging very nominal fees for the application of hiring and our motive is not to earn income but to restrict the no of application. Fees paid by the applicant is non refundable. No one can claim refund against any of the amount paid on any grounds. Decision of hiring will be taken after considering the qualifications and personal background of the applicant. Company is not bound to hire the applicant after receiving the application fees. All the hiring process will be performed as per the schedule fix by the company.
